name: Carbon Neutrality
title: Carbon Neutrality
description: The game of arriving carbon neutrality.

startingCarbon.description: The starting amount of carbon available on the board.

size.description: The number of cells vertically and horizontally on the board.

startingCellCarbon.description: The starting maximum mount of carbon in cell.

maxCellCarbon.description: The maximum carbon that can be in any cell.

recCollectorCost.description: The amount of recruitment center to recruit a new collector.

recPlanterCost.description: The amount of recruitment center to recruit a new planter.

moveCost.description: The percent deducted from ship's current carbon per move.

smeltCost.description: The amount of carbon to smelt cargos into carbon .

plantCost.description: The initial amount of planter to plant a tree.

plantInflationRate.description: The extra amount of planter to plant a tree. Real cost is (plantCost + n * plantInflationRate).

co2FrmWithered.description: The amount of carbon from withered tree.

seizeCost.description: The amount of planter to seize a tree from competitor.

collectRate.description: The rate of collector collected from a cell by not moving.

regenRate.description: The rate carbon regenerates on the board.

initialAbsorptionRate.description: The initial absorption rate of the tree

AbsorptionGrowthRate.description: The max absorption rate of the tree (init_rate + life * growth_rate

randomSeed.description: The seed used to initialize the random number generator.

agentTimeout.description: Obsolete field kept for backwards compatibility, please use observation.remainingOverageTime.

reward.description: The amount of player owned money (equal to players[index][0]) if the player has not been eliminated, else step_eliminated - episode_steps - 1.

carbon.description: Serialized list of available carbon per cell on the board.

players.description: List of players and their assets.

items.description: Money: The amount player owned money (equal to reward).
RecrtCenter: The position of player owned recruitment center.

additionalProperties.description: Key: uid of the asset (RecrtCenter). Value: position (row * size + column)

items.description: Workers: The list of player recruited workers.
Collected Carbon: The amount present in a worker.

additionalProperties.description: Key: uid of the asset (board). Value: position (row * size + column)

action.description: Actions taken per asset (planter or collector).

additionalProperties.description: Key: uid of the asset. Value: action. RECRUIT planter, RECRUIT collector
